title: Death Toll Climbs In Israel-Gaza Conflict Amid Attempts At Cease-Fire
teaser: Israel widened its operation into Gaza Sunday and each side had the highest death toll of this two-week-old conflict. NPR's Kelly McEvers talks to Daniel Estrin in Jerusalem about this deadly day.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
